rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新方法提高间充质干细胞修复关节软骨的功效来自新加坡-麻省理工学院研究与技术联盟 (SMART) 制造个性化医疗关键分析 (CAMP) 跨学科研究小组 (IRG) 的研究人员，新加坡麻省理工学院在新加坡的研究企业，以及新加坡国立大学组织工程项目的合作者 ( NUSTEP）开发了一种新方法，通过在 MSC 扩增过程中添加抗坏血酸（AA）来增强间充质基质细胞（MSC）生成软骨组织的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Novel-method-boosts-MSC-efficacy-for-ficial-cartilage-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Novel-method-boosts-MSC-efficacy-for-ficial-cartilage-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f5a377e-3d13-4ecc-89a4-32b37c6a7267 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 03:09:00 -0400 Novel method boosts MSC efficacy for articular cartilage repair
Ubiquigent 与 Alleo Labs 合作推进 DUB 靶向疗法Ubiquigent Limited（“Ubiquigent”）是一家药物发现和开发公司，利用新型去泛素酶（DUB）调节剂作为新疗法来满足医疗需求高度未得到满足的领域，今天宣布与先驱 Alleo Labs Corp.（“Alleo”）建立战略合作伙伴关系利用人工智能（AI）开发神经系统疾病的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Ubiquigent-partners-with-Alleo-Labs-to-advance-DUB-targeting-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Ubiquigent-partners-with-Alleo-Labs-to-advance-DUB-targeting-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b8eea4b-8f91-411b-a75d-5085e9edc345 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 03:08:00 -0400 Ubiquigent partners with Alleo Labs to advance DUB-targeting therapies
选择性MMP7抑制剂的突破性发现为癌症治疗带来了希望来自耶路撒冷希伯来大学、魏茨曼科学研究所和东京大学的研究小组通过开发一种名为基质金属肽酶 7 (MMP7) 的高选择性抑制剂，在抗击癌症方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Breakthrough-discovery-of-selective-MMP7-inhibitor-offers-hope-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Breakthrough-discovery-of-selective-MMP7-inhibitor-offers-hope-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc8de4b4-9791-41ad-bf05-3ab37e4c21fd Fri, 18 Oct 2024 03:05:00 -0400 Breakthrough discovery of selective MMP7 inhibitor offers hope for cancer treatment
酵母中的惊人发现可能为新的癌症治疗打开大门用于酿造啤酒的酵母能够在饥饿中存活的一种令人惊讶的方式的发现，可能为癌症的新疗法打开大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Surprising-discovery-in-yeast-could-open-the-door-to-new-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Surprising-discovery-in-yeast-could-open-the-door-to-new-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a97a2cb-aae3-4eb4-abe3-edfde2f58563 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 03:02:00 -0400 Surprising discovery in yeast could open the door to new cancer treatments
授权用于不可切除尿路上皮癌患者的新联合治疗安斯泰来制药有限公司 (Astellas Pharma Ltd.) 今天宣布，药品和保健品监管局 (MHRA) 已授予 PADCEV™（enfortumab vedotin，一种抗体药物偶联物 [ADC]）与 KEYTRUDA®（pembrolizumab，一种 PD-1 抑制剂）联合用药的授权用于一线治疗患有不可切除或转移性尿路上皮癌且符合含铂化疗资格的成年患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-combination-treatment-authorized-for-unresectable-urothelial-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-combination-treatment-authorized-for-unresectable-urothelial-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf7b0c61-20cc-4221-994d-18e07d0eef80 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:39:00 -0400 New combination treatment authorized for unresectable urothelial cancer patients
创新的大脑模拟增强了对神经元形成的理解萨里大学的科学家们建立了一种新的计算机模拟我们的大脑如何发育和生长神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-brain-simulation-enhances-understanding-of-neuron-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-brain-simulation-enhances-understanding-of-neuron-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0548b87-036a-48ae-b6bb-cce94e55026a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:27:00 -0400 Innovative brain simulation enhances understanding of neuron formation
新数据凸显了澳大利亚痴呆症的紧迫现实澳大利亚统计局（ABS）今天发布的最新数据突显了澳大利亚痴呆症的紧迫现实，表明痴呆症将成为该国的首要死因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-data-highlights-the-urgent-reality-of-dementia-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-data-highlights-the-urgent-reality-of-dementia-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b3ef11-6759-4493-ab7d-296468039d1c Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:23:00 -0400 New data highlights the urgent reality of dementia in Australia
研究人员创建了第一个产前人类皮肤的单细胞图谱研究人员首次创建了产前人类皮肤的单细胞图谱，以了解皮肤的形成方式以及疾病的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-create-first-single-cell-atlas-of-prenatal- human-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-create-first-single-cell-atlas-of-prenatal- human-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8415b799-ee0a-49c8-afe7-c00fd2a0842a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:22:00 -0400 Researchers create first single cell atlas of prenatal human skin
新研究强调遗传学是体重指数和肥胖风险的关键因素Genomics 在 Bupa 健康研讨会上展示的最新突破性研究表明，一个人的遗传背景是其 BMI 的关键驱动因素，因此对于了解其肥胖风险至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-research-highlights- Genetics-as-key-factor-in-BMI-and-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-research-highlights-genics-as-key-factor-in-BMI-and-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c1b7ba1-5b38-4b58-913e-b46a1da37151 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:19:00 -0400 New research highlights genetics as key factor in BMI and obesity risk
Accure Acne 获得 FDA 批准作为长期痤疮解决方案Accure Acne, Inc.™ 是开发治疗痤疮的创新解决方案的先驱，今天宣布，该公司已获得 FDA 的新许可 K242035，用于长期治疗轻度至重度炎症性寻常痤疮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Accure-Acne-secures-FDA-clearance-for-long-term-acne-solution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Accure-Acne-secures-FDA-clearance-for-long-term-acne-solution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4aba7c8-0aab-422d-957a-720fb2e662b6 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:14:00 -0400 Accure Acne secures FDA clearance for long-term acne solution
